data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 18,138 believers in Udham Singh Nagar to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Udham Singh Nagar, Uttarakhand, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Udham Singh Nagar to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 18,138 believers in Udham Singh Nagar to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,630,762 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Udham Singh Nagar to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Kayastha Saksena people.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Udham Singh Nagar, Uttarakhand, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Udham Singh Nagar, Uttarakhand, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Udham Singh Nagar, Uttarakhand, India has a population of 1,648,900.

We estimate Udham Singh Nagar has 18,138 people who might know Jesus, 20,007 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,610,755 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Udham Singh Nagar, Uttarakhand, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
